AD_KethericCombat.synopsis: Players triggered outcast state in MOO by attacking Ketheric in execution or going to the roof before time.Plays in the first combat Ketheric participates when the state is active.

AD_ZrellCombat.synopsis: Players triggered outcast state in MOO by attacking Ketheric in execution or going to the roof before time.Plays in the first combat Zrell participates when the state is active.

AD_KethericCombat_0.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
AD_KethericCombat_0.text: Take your penance - in Her name.
